title: Who do you think is the loneliest champion?
body:
imo it's {{champion:45}}  because he has no special interactions with anyone and vice versa and is pretty much never spoken about in any events

even amumu has more dialogue with other champions + he is more often spoken about as well

any other opinions?

replies.body: Uhmmm... {{champion:32}}. His whole gimmick is loneliness. Maybe he has seen less people than other champs, but in terms of emotions, he is definitely the loneliest.
Possibly {{champion:111}} , he was totally left at the bottom of the ocean for who knows how long.
"I miss my kind...."{{champion:72}} {{item:3070}}

You have no kind.

This is your home now: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/34/Rub_al_Khali_002.JPG

You will remember Yorick Mori. *Please* remember Yorick Mori....

P.S. {{champion:45}} is friends with {{champion:117}} .
{{champion:266}} his only relationship is to Tryndamere who kind of hates him...

> [{quoted}](name=fowus2happy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8Bjv6Bw4,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-06-25T13:07:33.668+0000)
>
> {{champion:266}} his only relationship is to Tryndamere who kind of hates him...

The only other 4 Darkin that exist we can assume he never sees as he never speaks of them. Ever.

Speaking of Darkin, didn't riot say something about a new Darkin champion possibly coming soon?

The lonliest in terms of lore? {{champion:157}} He's constantly being hunted down by people from his own nation of Ionia while also having to avoid all Noxians as well. "A sword's poor company for a long road." 

Amumu is definitely up there though since it seems to be his thing.

To me it's Yorick {{champion:83}} . His existence is an eternal heavy burden. The only things his eyes can catch are the dead bodies and friable soil. A damned creature who couldn't find love in his lore, in the player base and, most importantly, Riot Games.

> [{quoted}](name=Krizalid,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8Bjv6Bw4,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2015-06-28T01:54:51.664+0000)
>
> To me it's Yorick {{champion:83}} . His existence is an eternal heavy burden. The only things his eyes can catch are the dead bodies and friable soil. A damned creature who couldn't find love in his lore, in the player base and, most importantly, Riot Games.

yup poor yorick
{{champion:83}}  Nobody has even played him

{{champion:75}} Has lived a long life with a significant part of it walking among the ruins of his civilization,possibly regretting what happened to his brother.

{{champion:143}} Has had no interaction with anyone else , a completely isolated character.

> [{quoted}](name=shinijumanjiman,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8Bjv6Bw4,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-06-25T18:37:44.709+0000)
>
> {{champion:75}} Has lived a long life with a significant part of it walking among the ruins of his civilization,possibly regretting what happened to his brother.
> 
> {{champion:143}} Has had no interaction with anyone else , a completely isolated character.

Moakai gains 1 movespeed when is very close to her.
Boom. "Interaction".
What about Leona too, I mean...cause the sun?
{{champion:36}}
{{champion:36}}
What about heart seeker vayne?
{{champion:6}} , an abomination feared by all, his life is a neverending march of misery, all he has left is his petty hatred.

{{champion:421}}  some other person mentioned about missing their kind.

{{champion:150}} , no other person can understand any sounds he makes.

{{champion:131}}  is the only Champion Guarding Truth!

From: FuryofThornsRedo

> [{quoted}](name=FuryofThornsRedo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8Bjv6Bw4,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-06-25T17:32:10.675+0000)
>
> {{champion:421}}  some other person mentioned about missing their kind.
> 
> {{champion:150}} , no other person can understand any sounds he makes.
> 
> {{champion:131}}  is the only Champion Guarding Truth!
> 
> From: FuryofThornsRedo

Well... Gnar is 4 years old -withoutcountingtheicething- and he is learning to speak. He is also friend of Lulu and Heimerdinger.

And... i suppose that you wanted to say {{champion:72}} instead of {{champion:421}} because she has a lot of "babies".

{{champion:421}}  No I was with what I said. I read somewhere {{champion:421}}  might have babies, but they are nowhere near her. Were they taken? Or is she defending them in a long distance mission to defend and protect her family?

From: FuryofThornsRedo
{{champion:117}}
{{champion:17}} It aint easy being sadistic.

Teemo has a lot of friends in Bandle City, including Tristana. 

He is only sadistic/evil when fighting. He is perfectly "normal" off-duty.

Tristana has interactions with Veigar.

She basically sees him as a joke.
Zilean had his entire country killed
{{champion:33}} OK
{{champion:92}} who da fk would wanna be friends with her? NOT EVEN AMUMU
